titles.title: Improving Health Insurance Affordability Act of 2019
Improving Health Insurance Affordability Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand eligibility for the refundable credit for coverage under a qualified health plan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Improving Health Insurance Affordability Act of 2019
This bill expands taxpayer eligibility for the refundable tax credit for the cost of health care insurance and increases the size of the tax credit for all income brackets.
